original_text: if it is to be accepted for you it shall be a male without blemish, of the bulls or the sheep or the goats.
korean_text: 기쁘게 받으심이 되도록 소나 양이나 염소의 흠 없는 수컷으로 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: if it is to be accepted for you
it shall be a male without blemish
of the bulls or the sheep or the goats
